overview: 5 Nights, 5 Steaks is a documentary that opens with the question, "So has your own life been a success?" Over the course of the film a steak dinner is eaten with a Marxist Professor, a Railroad Engineer, a Rancher, a struggling Filmmaker, and a retired Bartender.
tagline: So has your life been a success?
title: 5 Nights, 5 Steaks
